## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)
- [ ] Security fix (change that addresses a security vulnerability)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Dependency update

## Security Checklist

- [ ] No secrets, API keys, or credentials are committed
- [ ] Input validation is applied to all user inputs
- [ ] XSS prevention measures are in place for rendered content
- [ ] No new `eval()`, `Function()`, or `dangerouslySetInnerHTML` usage without sanitization
- [ ] Dependencies have been checked for known vulnerabilities (`npm audit`)

## Testing

- [ ] Existing tests pass (`npm run test`)
- [ ] New tests added for new functionality
- [ ] Type checking passes (`npm run type-check`)
- [ ] Linting passes (`npm run lint`)
